mapper.select: select id, monitor_id, monitor_node_id, log_name, log_index, log_type, attribute_name, attribute_field, attribute_ognl, create_time, update_time from monitor_data_map_node_field where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into monitor_data_map_node_field(monitor_id, monitor_node_id, log_name, log_index, log_type, attribute_name, attribute_field, attribute_ognl, create_time, update_time) values (#{monitorId}, #{monitorNodeId}, #{logName}, #{logIndex}, #{logType}, #{attributeName}, #{attributeField}, #{attributeOgnl}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into monitor_data_map_node_field(monitor_id, monitor_node_id, log_name, log_index, log_type, attribute_name, attribute_field, attribute_ognl, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.monitorId}, #{entity.monitorNodeId}, #{entity.logName}, #{entity.logIndex}, #{entity.logType}, #{entity.attributeName}, #{entity.attributeField}, #{entity.attributeOgnl}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into monitor_data_map_node_field(monitor_id, monitor_node_id, log_name, log_index, log_type, attribute_name, attribute_field, attribute_ognl, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.monitorId}, #{entity.monitorNodeId}, #{entity.logName}, #{entity.logIndex}, #{entity.logType}, #{entity.attributeName}, #{entity.attributeField}, #{entity.attributeOgnl}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update monitor_id = values(monitor_id), monitor_node_id = values(monitor_node_id), log_name = values(log_name), log_index = values(log_index), log_type = values(log_type), attribute_name = values(attribute_name), attribute_field = values(attribute_field), attribute_ognl = values(attribute_ognl), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update monitor_data_map_node_field
monitor_id = #{monitorId},
monitor_node_id = #{monitorNodeId},
log_name = #{logName},
log_index = #{logIndex},
log_type = #{logType},
attribute_name = #{attributeName},
attribute_field = #{attributeField},
attribute_ognl = #{attributeOgnl},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
